channel.description: Recent content in ENG on Álvaro A. Gutiérrez Vargas

item.title: randregret at the UK Stata Meeting - London, 2020!
item.description: UK Stata Meeting - London, 2020. Slides from my presentation at the UK Stata Meeting should render below, if not you can get them from this link. I hope you enjoy them! Any questions are very welcome to my email :) Also the repository with the source code and examples can be found here: https://github.com/alvarogutyerrez/randregret Also on twitter… Have you ever made a desition that you regret?

item.title: String or not to String on Stata: Collection of usefull tools
item.description: Random string utilities that saved me in the past. Parsing cmdline after a estimation command. . qui reg price rep78 length foreign , robust . local what_I_typed = e(cmdline) . di "`what_I_typed'" regress price rep78 length foreign , robust gettoken: be carefull with the spaces (!!) we can split the command (regress) from the rest. . gettoken command rhs : what_I_typed ,parse(" ,") // first token and the rest .

item.title: Are my labels there? Searching among label variables values on Stata
item.description: The problem This brief post answer the question my orignal google search How to check if a value is contained into a label variable on stata? Imagine we have a problem where we need to check if a string is contained into the labels of another variable. Let’s start with a minimal example using sysuse auto and the variable foreing which is the only one with labels already in place.
